mapper.select: SELECT f.favorites_no , f.favorites_reg_date , s.shelter_no , s.careNm , s.careAddr , s.careTel , f.nickname FROM favorites f JOIN shelter s ON f.shelter_no = s.shelter_no WHERE f.nickname=#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT shelter_no FROM favorites WHERE nickname=#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT favorites_no ,favorites_reg_date ,shelter_no ,careNm ,careAddr ,careTel ,nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn ,f.favorites_no , f.favorites_reg_date , s.shelter_no , s.careNm , s.careAddr , s.careTel , f.nickname FROM favorites f JOIN shelter s ON f.shelter_no = s.shelter_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} ) AND f.nickname=#{nickname} ) WHERE rn > ( ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} )
